Deletion or modification of system files.Data: Windows Event ID 4663, Windows Event ID 4660, Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 4657, Zeek file.log
Deletion or modification of system files.Action: Monitor Windows Event IDs 4663, 4660, 4688, 4657, Zeek file.log for deletion or modification events targeting common persistence locations (e.g., startup folders, system32, registry run keys, service paths). Correlate deletion/modification events with recent process activity. Use statistical analysis (e.g., frequency or time series) on these events to identify anomalous cleanup activity.

Deletion of user accounts, particularly.Data: Windows Event ID 4726, Windows Event ID 4720, Windows Event ID 4738
Deletion of user accounts, particularly.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4726 (Account Deletion). Correlate deletion events with recent account creation (4720) or modification (4738) events. Use time series analysis or frequency analysis to identify atypical timing or volume of account deletions.
